text: "Crushcrushcrush" is a single released by Pop rock band Paramore from their second album RIOT! In the music video you can see the band performing. They are some spies also and it plays on the lyric "They taped over your mouth scribbled out the truth with their lies you little spies" "Crushcrushcrush" is a download in Rock Band. Category:Paramore songs Category:2007 songs
title: Crushcrushcrush
